blogPost.excerpt: Do you support decentralization and an open internet that isn’t dominated by a handful of Big Tech companies? Now you can be part of the revolution by operating a Presearch Node and helping to power the Presearch decentralized search engine.
blogPost.body: Do you support decentralization and an open internet that isn’t dominated by a handful of Big Tech companies? Now you can be part of the revolution by operating a Presearch Node and helping to power the Presearch decentralized search engine.
blogPost.title: Presearch - A Better Search Engine - Support decentralized search by becoming a node operator.
blogPost.author: Alex Carrabre

localize.description: 你是否支持去中心化和开放的互联网，而不是由少数大科技公司主导？现在，你可以通过运营一个Presearch节点，帮助推动Presearch去中心化搜索引擎，成为革命的一部分。
localize.tagline: 支持去中心化搜索，成为节点运营商。

localize.description: 你是否支持去中心化和開放的互聯網，而不是由少數大科技公司主導？現在，你可以通過運營一個Presearch節點，幫助推動Presearch去中心化搜索引擎，成爲革命的一部分。
localize.tagline: 支持去中心化搜索，成爲節點運營商。

previous.excerpt: This extension attempts to recover your suspended Great Suspender tabs by searching your browser history and displaying any found suspended tabs. You can then: - adjust grouping, sorting and detail - save as folders and bookmarks - copy URLs to the clipboard
previous.title: The Great Suspender Recovery Tool - Recover your lost Great Suspender tabs

localize.description: 该扩展程序通过搜索您的浏览器历史记录并显示任何发现的暂停标签，试图恢复您暂停的Great Suspender标签。然后您可以 - 调整分组、排序和细节 - 保存为文件夹和书签 - 将URL复制到剪贴板上
localize.tagline: 恢复您丢失的Great Suspender tabs

localize.description: 該擴展程序通過搜索您的瀏覽器歷史記錄並顯示任何發現的暫停標籤，試圖恢復您暫停的Great Suspender標籤。然後您可以 - 調整分組、排序和細節 - 保存爲文件夾和書籤 - 將URL複製到剪貼板上
localize.tagline: 恢復您丟失的Great Suspender tabs

next.excerpt: Toad is the simplest URL shortener with a built-in API, detailed analytics, and custom domain support. Toad is built to be fun yet powerful. What's stopping you? Make the leap!
next.title: Toad - The simplest URL shortener

localize.description: Toad是最简单的URL缩短器，具有内置的API，详细的分析和自定义域名支持。Toad的设计既有趣又强大。是什么阻止了你？跃跃欲试吧
Toad是最簡單的URL縮短器，具有內置的API，詳細的分析和自定義域名支持。Toad的設計既有趣又強大。是什麼阻止了你？躍躍欲試吧
